title: Yes Bank ties up with Newtap Finance to Offer Financing Solutions
description: Yes Bank has entered into a co-lending partnership with Newtap Finance to offer personalized financing solutions on CRED. Dreamplug Technologies Private Limited (DTPL), the operator of CRED, will act as the Lending Service Provider (LSP) for Yes Bank and Newtap Finance in this partnership.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
